desc: Model training parameters that direct the training process for an activity classifier model.

items.name: init(validationData: MLActivityClassifier.DataSource, batchSize: Int?, maximumIterations: Int?, predictionWindowSize: Int?)

items.desc: Creates a set of activity classifier parameters that includes a validation dataset in a data table.

items.desc: The number of sequence chunks the training session uses per iteration.

items.name: var maximumIterations: Int?
items.desc: The maximum number of iterations over the training data the training session uses.

items.name: var predictionWindowSize: Int?
items.desc: The number of samples for each labeled activity.

items.desc: A text representation of the activity-model parameters.
